metadata.description: Experiment 3 (Pursuit-Evasion variant): Environmental Robustness on PE task. Test interaction between embedding_dim and communication sparsity.
metadata.note: Parallel structure to robustness_exploration.json but for PE task.

matrix_parameters.description: Test variation: 3 embed_dims x 3 comm_radius x 2 obs_models (PE-specific: global_basic, global_extended) x 1 fixed topology (no torus) = 18 unique configs. Each run 3 times with different seeds. Total: 54 runs.
matrix_parameters.note: PE task uses global observations primarily (agents see all pursuers and evader). Torus topology not varied here.

experiments._abbreviated: Full config would have: 3 embed_dims × 3 comm_radius × 2 obs_models × 3 seeds = 54 configurations. Naming: pe_robust_embed{D}_comm{R}_obs{O}_seed{S}.
